summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackIt's a 10 Miracle Finishing Spray is the perfect product to lock in style. Years of testing and formulation have led to a truly "10" hair spray, giving hair body and control with a workable, flexible hold. It's a 10 Miracle Finishing Spray adds shine while being humidity resistant and quick drying.
details: DetailsBenefitsFlexible hold formulaAdds shineHumidity resistantLayers wellQuick dryingNot sticky or rigidAdds bodyWeightlessAdds controlBrushable formulaFeaturesUV protectantParaben freeVeganGluten freeLeaping Bunny CertifiedKey IngredientsLinalool: A plant-based shaper and fragrance that rinses clean and leaves no residue.Item 2622324How To UseShake can before each use. Hold upright 10 to 12 inches away from hair and spray. Holds and retains finished hairstyle.IngredientsAlcohol Denat., Hydrofluorocarbon 152a, Butyl Ester of PVM/MA Copolymer, PhenylAlcohol Denat., Hydrofluorocarbon 152a, Butyl Ester of PVM/MA Copolymer, Phenyl Dimethicone, Aminomethyl Propanol, Benzophenone-4, Benzyl Benzoate, Limonene, LinaloolShipping & Coupon RestrictionsShipping Restrictions : This item cannot be shipped via air.
how_to_use: Shake can before each use. Hold upright 10 to 12 inches away from hair and spray. Holds and retains finished hairstyle.

reviews.headline: Amazing
reviews.comments: I love this hairspray because it holds but isn't super heavy. I used to overdo it with other brands but this one works well without using too much of it.

reviews.headline: It Truly is a 10
reviews.comments: I haven't used hair spray in a while and thought I'd give this a try to help with the cowlick on the back of my head.  It works nicely and the fragrance isn't too overwhelming.

reviews.headline: Finally!
reviews.comments: I feel like I have finally found the perfect match for my naturally wavy/curly hair that I straighten everyday. This is so lightweight sprayed on, but provides just the control I need without feeling sticky or heavy.
